pkg_command

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkg_command.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AleaCommand, AttackCommand, BackCommand, ChargeCommand, DropCommand, EatCommand, EquipCommand, FireCommand, GoCommand, HelpCommand, InventaireCommand, LookCommand, TakeCommand, TalkCommand, TestCommand, UseCommand, WaitCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe abstraite servant à la création de commandes
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Quentin Garrido

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        public Command(java.lang.String pSW)
        Create a command object. First and second word must be supplied, but either one (or both) can be null. The command word should be null to indicate that this was a command that is not recognised by this game.
        Parameters:
        pSW - Second mot de la commande

    • Method Detail

      • getSecondWord

        public java.lang.String getSecondWord()
        Return the second word of this command. If no second word was entered, the result is null.
        Returns:
        second mot de la commande

      • hasSecondWord

        public boolean hasSecondWord()
        Check whether a second word was entered for this command.
        Returns:
        true si la commande contient un second mot

      • setSecondWord

        public void setSecondWord(java.lang.String secondWord)
        Define the second word of this command (the word entered after the command word). Null indicates that there was no second word.
        Parameters:
        secondWord - deuxième mot de la commande

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(GameEngine pG)
        Execute this command. A flag is returned indicating whether the game is over as a result of this command.
        Parameters:
        pG - GameEngine associé
